borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
decision_conditions: No plumbing, extract flues, or pipes.
No other alterations to exterior of buil
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension; erection of a single storey extension to the side of the main building including a front door opening; excavation and enlargement of the existing basement; installation of a new rooflight, roof access hatch and a solar panel above the main flat roof and installation of a rooflight and solar panel in the side roofslope at main roof level; installation of a rooflight and solar panel in the side roofslope and replacement of the existing rooflight with a new rooflight above the roof of first floor rear back addition; replacement of the existing windows with new doors and formation of a roof terrace to the rear elevation, and replacement of the existing window with a new window to the side elevation at first floor level; installation of new sliding doors to replace the existing windows and doors to the rear elevation, infilling of the existing window and installation of new window openings comprising of 3no windows to the side elevation at ground floor level.
